title: runtime: TestGdbPython fails with 'module' object has no attribute 'error'
body:
From https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/WFPWHpG1NOM/JWXHWwgb_WMJ

The build fails running the runtime tests, with:

--- FAIL: TestGdbPython (0.73s) 
        runtime-gdb_test.go:99: info goroutines failed: Traceback (most recent call last): 
                  File "/home/gb113119/Go/source/go/src/runtime/runtime-gdb.py", line 395, in invoke 
                    except gdb.error: 
                AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'error' 
                Error occurred in Python command: 'module' object has no attribute 'error' 
FAIL 
FAIL        runtime        16.320s 

This is on RHEL 6.6, GCC version 4.4.7, GDB version 7.2, Python versoin 2.6.6.
